SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class TileBag

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.TileBag
public class TileBag extends Object
Model's internal representation of the tile bag.
Since tiles are drawn from a bag with limited capacity to refill the board, the distribution of tiles over time changes.
To better model this behaviour, the tiles in the bag must be kept track of.
Note that all contents of the Tile Bag include the tiles on the board. Tiles are removed from the bag when put on shelves.

  • Method Details

    • getTileAmount

      public int getTileAmount(Tile tile)
      Get the number of tiles of the given type in play.
      Parameters:
      tile - The type of tile (both kind and sprite value) to count occurrences of.
      Returns:
      Number of tiles of type tile currently in the bag and in the board, if NOTILE 0

    • removeSelection

      public void removeSelection(List<Tile> selection)
      Remove selected list of tiles from play. Selection should not contain NOTILEs, and selection should be limited to bag contents
      Parameters:
      selection - List of tiles to remove from the bag.
